actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-336.

official_title: A bill to establish a permanent National Native American Advisory Commission, to remove restrictions regarding the reorganization of the Bureau of Indian Affairs, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Native American Advisory Commission Act

summary.text: Title I: National Native American Advisory Commission - National Native American Advisory Commission Act - Establishes the National Native American Advisory Commission to foster government-to-government relationships between the United States and Native American governments. Authorizes the Commission to secure necessary information from any Federal department or agency to enable it to carry out this Act. Authorizes appropriations. Title II: Repeal of Certain Provisions of Law - Repeals specified provisions of Federal law with respect to the operation of Indian programs.

titles.title: National Native American Advisory Commission Act
A bill to establish a permanent National Native American Advisory Commission, to remove restrictions regarding the reorganization of the Bureau of Indian Affairs, and for other purposes.
